select cb.id as billId, cb.amount, cb.bill_type, cb.purchase_time, cb.remark, cb.user_id, cb.is_user_type,
u.nick_name, u.user_avatar, u.account
m.nick_name, m.user_avatar, m.account
CASE WHEN cb.is_user_type = 0 THEN u.nick_name WHEN cb.is_user_type = 1 THEN m.nick_name ELSE NULL END as nick_name, CASE WHEN cb.is_user_type = 0 THEN u.user_avatar WHEN cb.is_user_type = 1 THEN m.user_avatar ELSE NULL END as user_avatar, CASE WHEN cb.is_user_type = 0 THEN u.account WHEN cb.is_user_type = 1 THEN m.account ELSE NULL END as account
from customer_bill cb
left join users u on u.user_id = cb.user_id
left join merchant m on m.user_id = cb.user_id
left join users u on u.user_id = cb.user_id and cb.is_user_type = 0 left join merchant m on m.user_id = cb.user_id and cb.is_user_type = 1
cb.bill_type = #{query.billType}
and cb.is_user_type = #{query.isUserType}
and cb.purchase_time = #{query.purchaseTime}
order by cb.purchase_time desc
